subject.topic: New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815

mods.abstract: Packenham falls back dead on a white horse while soldiers catch him. On the right, a British dragoon grappling with sword-wielding American. In the foreground, there is an pierced drum on the ground. Fighting in background at the Battle of New Orleans. "Battle of New Orleans - Death of General Packenham"
